subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[stem]]; [[stalk]]; something like a stalk
# [[tall]] and [[straight]]
# [[pillar]]
# [[penis]]
# [[handle]]
# {{zh-classifier|[[strips]] or [[stalks]] of objects}}
